name: Resurrected will
description:
Resurrested will is a cinematic souls like game with RPG elements. When creating this game, I focused on a cinematic picture and camera, souls like combat, ease of passage. The game has an atmospheric melancholy spirit of the Middle Ages. Press LShift for to jump off. Joystick dont work in inventoruy window. To switch from keyboard to joystick press escape and select input joystick. A little about future plans 

1) new locations

2) shop

3) new weapons

4) power-ups and character leveling

5) simple and pleasant plot

6) bosses

7) advanced ai

I'm making the game by myself, I don't have a permanent job, so I'll be glad for any support.

1) buy demo materials 

2) buy my horror game Police station mystery

3) donate to the development of the project

4) just rate the game, welcome any comments and feedback.

5) recommend the game to your friends
